DOC.brief_summary: The present study examine effect Methyldopa uterine artery diameter , uterine artery blood flow , umbilical artery fetal middle-cerebral artery patient Preeclampsia , use Doppler ultrasound .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Methyldopa Uterine Artery Diameter Pregnant Women With Mild Preeclampsia
DOC.criteria: They meet inclusion criterion , If 25 week gestational age , history chronic hypertension , diabetes mellitus , chronic systemic disease , collagen vascular disease antiphospholipid syndrome , use antihypertensive drug BMI high 19 low 30 ( kg/m2 ) .
